var.v: linear-gradient(to top, @focusBorderShadow@ 1px, transparent 1px) no-repeat, linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255,192,0,0.1),rgba(255,192,0,0.1))
linear-gradient(to top, @focusBorderShadowField@ 1px, transparent 1px) no-repeat, linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255,192,0,0.1),rgba(255,192,0,0.1))
-webkit-touch-callout: none;-webkit-user-select: none;-khtml-user-select: none;-moz-user-select: none;-ms-user-select: none;user-select: none;
